mcq.statement: Why is the large intestine referred to as 'large'?

options.a: It is longer than the small intestine
options.b: It is heavier than the small intestine
options.c: It is wider than the small intestine

mcq.one_liner: The large intestine is called 'large' because it is **wider than the small intestine**, not because of its length.

suggestions.topic: Largest and Smallest in Human Body
